rgis 0.2.7
  • Reference

rgis: utilities to perform GIS operations in R

Installation

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Pakillo/rgis")

Current functions:

  • ungzip: Decompress gzip files.

  • extract_velox_parallel: Fast extraction of raster values for points and polygons.

  • Report a bug at
